sentence: Pool area really nice and the pool bar staff nice and attentive
breakfast pool cocktails beach location balconylocation local bus took forever to get to the old town and port
You get GREAT pizzas from the pool barSPA GYM We were actually pretty surprised to find out that the spa was so big and upscaled
Decent pool and gym
The beach bar is very cool with good swimming off the rocks
The pool bar and the Mistral restaurant by the beach are great and the food is excellent it is not cheap but worth the money
Facilities restaurants pools bedrooms beach area and bar spa were of a very high standard and very relaxing comfortable
Nice hotel with nice pool and beach it is a bit expensive for what you getting
Lovely views comfortable rooms good restaurants two swimming pools
Pool area is beautiful lined with palm trees

Very disappointing that on check in we were advised the indoor pool was closed especially as the end of the season is not until the end of October the beach area was also scaled down with very few sunbeds and parasols available from the 1st October
There is a lovely pool area with a warm pool but the downside is the prices
Pool area was amazing also viewStaf was unpolite arrogant
Unfortunately the indoor swimming pool was closed for maintenance we were warned about this ahead of departure but the Hotel kept the outdoor pool open
We did not use the pool or the spa
Swimming pool indoor closed only told when too late to find a suitable alternative but other spa facilities still open sauna jacuzi etc
Take the cabs at the back of the queue or agree a price before you get inWe were n’t aware that the indoor pool was closed when booking but were assured we ’d always get a sun bed by the pool
The pool is n’t too large but why go to the pool when you have the sea
The pool area is totally overcrowded though with loungers practically on top of each other and blaring music
I did not like that the pool was not working as it was one of the main reasons we chose this hotel
